price: Lẹ́yìn náà, wò ó padà ní ẹ̀ẹ̀ mejì, kí ojú rẹ padà sí ọ̀dọ̀ rẹ pẹ̀lú ìyẹpẹrẹ. Ó sì máa káàárẹ̀.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma ir'jiʿi al-baṣara karratayni yanqalib ilayka al-baṣaru khāsi-an wahuwa ḥasīrun
